SA11bsa040_u:4_1: kalyāṇamitre śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādya evam adhyeṣitavyam- yathā pūrvatathāgatārhat-samyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmisthitabodhisattvaiśca pūrvam anuttarasamyaksambodhau cittotpādaḥ kṛtaḥ tathā evaṃ nāmno mamāpi ācāryo 'nuttarasamyaksambodhau cittam utpādayed iti triḥ vadet /
SA11bsa040_u:5_1: ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dvipadānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11bsa040_u:5_2: samanvāhara ācārya / ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ dharmāṇāmuttamaṃ śāntavirāgaṃ dharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11bsa040_u:5_3: samanvāhara ācārya / ahamevaṃnāmā etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ gaṇānāmuttamaṃ āryabodhisattvāvaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi iti triḥ vadet /
SA11bsa040_u:6_0: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ śaraṇagamanaṃ kṛttvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ,
SA11bsa040_u:6_1: daśadiśāṃ sarvabuddhān bodhisattvāṃśca manasā ālambya praṇamanaṃ yathālabdhaṃ pūjādikaṃ ca kuryāt /
SA11bsa040_u:6_2: ācāryam sammukhaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsano 'pi vā kṛtāñjaliḥ cittam utpādayet /
SA11bsa040_u:7_1: ācārya! samanvāhara / ahamevaṃnāmā- asyāṃ jātāvanyāsu vā jātiṣvanavarāgre vā dāna-śīla-bhāvanāyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ yathā pūrvakaiḥ tathāgatārhatsamyaksambuddhaiḥ mahābhūmipraviṣṭaiḥ mahābodhisattvaiśca anuttarasaṃyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tathā evaṃnāmā ahamapi etatkālaprabhṛti yāvadbodhimaṇḍaṃ anuttarasamyakmahāsambodhau cittam utpādayeyam /
SA11bsa040_u:7_2: atīrṇān sattvān tārayeyam / amuktasattvān mocayeyam / anāśvastān āśvāsayeyam / aparinirvṛtān parinirvāpayeyam /
SA11bsa040_u:8_0: tathaiva ācāryābhāve 'pi svayaṃ bodhicittotpādavidhiḥ- tathāgataśākyamuniṃ daśadiksarvatathāgatāṃśca manasā vicintya vandanā-pūjādividhiṃ ca kṛtvā adhyeṣaṇāsahitamācāryapadavirahitaśaraṇagamanādikramaṃ pūrvavad niṣpādayet /
SA11bsa040_u:8_1: evaṃ utpannacittaḥ pudgalaḥ bodhicittavṛddhyartha antaśo divā trivāraṃ rātrau ca trivāraṃ-
SA11bsa040_u:9_0: buddhaṃ ca dharmañca gaṇottamaṃ ca yāvaddhi bodhiṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi /
SA11bsa040_u:9_1: dānādikṛtyaiśca kṛtairmayaibhiḥ buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya // 3 //
SA11bsa040_u:10_0: iti bodhicittamutpādayet / bodhicittavyāghātakebhyaścaturbhyo rdharmebhyo vyāvṛtto bhavet /
SA11bsa040_u:12_1: ye sattvāḥ kuśale sthāpitāḥ teṣām anuttarasamyaksambodhau sthāpanaṃ na tu śrāvakapratyekabuddhatveṣviti /
SA11bsa040_u:14_0: tatra prathamaṃ vidhivad utpannabodhicittasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvaśīlaśikṣāṃ suśikṣitukāmanayā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvasaṃvarasthitaṃ,
SA11bsa040_u:14_1: bodhisattvasaṃvaravidhijñaṃ bodhisattvasaṃvarapradānena śiṣyānugrahasamartha kalyāṇamitraṃ namaskṛtya taccaraṇe nipatya adhyeṣaṇā- “ācārya! tavāhaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamākāṃkṣāmyādātuṃ tadarhasyanuparodhena muhūrtamasmākamanukampayā dātuṃ śrotuñca”,
SA11bsa040_u:15_0: “kulaputra! tvaṃ śrṛṇu / tvam evaṃ sattvān anuttīrṇān uttārya,
SA11bsa040_u:15_1: amuktān mocayitvā, anāśvatān āśvāsya, aparinirvṛttān parinirvāpya, buddhavaṃśānucchedam icchasi? tatastvaṃ cittotpādadārḍhya samādānadārḍhyañca kuru /
SA11bsa040_u:16_0: tatpaścāt tathāgataśākyamuneḥ niṣiktāṃ pratimāṃ paṭacitram vā purato 'vasthāpya tathāgataśākyamunyādīn daśadiksarvalokadhātvavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān purato bhāvayet /
SA11bsa040_u:16_1: yathāśakti bāhyapañcapūjayā pūjāṃ vandanaṃ ca kuryāt /
SA11bsa040_u:17_0: tadanantaraṃ kalyāṇamitram uccāsanasthitaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā namaskṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukāsanena vāpi kṛtāñjaliḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrahaṇāya evam adhyeṣayet-
SA11bsa040_u:18_0: “ācāryo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ me śīghraṃ dadātu” ityevaṃ trivāraṃ kalyāṇamitram adhyeṣeta /
SA11bsa040_u:18_1: tataḥ kalyāṇamitra upaviṣṭa utthito vāpi saḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ taṃ evaṃ paripṛcchet- “evaṃnāmā tvaṃ bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
SA11bsa040_u:18_2: evaṃ pṛṣṭe sati tena grāhakabodhisattvenāpi āmeti pratijñātavyam” /
SA11bsa040_u:19_0: tataḥ 'akṣayāprameyānuttarapuṇyamahānidhibhūtaḥ sarvabuddhaguṇaratnākaro bodhisattvasaṃvaro 'cireṇa adhigamyata' iti cintayan cittaprasādāt saharṣa tūṣṇībhūya kṛtāñjalistiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa040_u:20_0: atha sa kalyāṇamitraḥ trikālasarvabodhisattvasarvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca śīlaṃsaṃvaraśīlaṃ ,
SA11bsa040_u:20_1: kuśaladharmasaṅgrāhakaśīlaṃ, sattvārthakriyāśīlañca samāsataḥ śiṣyam ababodhya- “sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni tāni ca sarvabodhisattvaśīlāni kiṃ mattaḥ gṛhītukāmo 'si” evaṃ śiṣyaṃ pṛcchet /
SA11bsa040_u:20_2: tasmin tathā “gṛhītukāmo 'smi” iti pratijñāte sati bodhisattvasaṃvaro dātavyaḥ /
SA11bsa040_u:21_0: tvamevaṃnāmā bhadanta āyuṣmān kulaputro vā mat bodhisattva ityeva saṃjñakāt “sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
SA11bsa040_u:21_3: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa040_u:21_8: evam ācāryeṇa trivāraṃ “grahīṣyasi kiṃ” iti uktvā śiṣyeṇa “ām sugṛhīṣyāmi” iti trivāraṃ abhihite saṃvaraṃ samādadyāt /
SA11bsa040_u:22_0: tataḥ sa kalyāṇamitraḥ śiṣyāya bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ sattvā daśadiksarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ pañcāṅganamaskārapūrva kṛtāñjaliḥ evaṃ trivāraṃ vadet- “pratīgṛhītamanena evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikād yāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA11bsa040_u:22_1: so 'hamevaṃnāmātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtamasyaitannāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvasattvāviparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmyasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam” /
SA11bsa040_u:23_0: daśadiksabuddhabodhisattvebhya uktvā, namaskṛtya ca guruśiṣyau uttiṣṭhetām /”
SA11bsa040_u:24_0: tata utthāya kalyāṇamitraḥ bodhisattvasaṃvaragrāhakaṃ bodhisattvam evaṃ brūyāt- “evaṃnāma bodhisattva! tvaṃ śṛṇu- iyaṃ hi dharmatā /
SA11bsa040_u:24_1: yadā bodhisattvena bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānakarmavācanā parisampādyate tadā daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetreṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu etādṛṅnimittāni prādurbhavanti /
SA11bsa040_u:24_2: te buddhabodhisattvā evaṃ kasmiṃścid buddhakṣetre evaṃnāmā bodhisattva evaṃnāmno bodhisattvād bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāti iti saṃjānanti” /
SA11bsa040_u:24_3: ataḥ te bhagavanto buddhā te ca bodhisattvā dharmasnehāt putrān bhrātṛkāniva sandadhate /
SA11bsa040_u:25_0: atha tena kalyāṇamitreṇa sa bodhisattva evaṃ vaktvyaḥ /
SA11bsa040_u:25_1: evaṃnāmabodhisattva / tvaṃ śṛṇu / bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānamidaṃ aśraddadhānānām agre na vācyam /
SA11bsa040_u:25_2: yato 'śraddhebhyo bodhisattvasaṃvarapradarśane aśraddadhānā sattvāste bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ aśraddhayā parityajanti /
SA11bsa040_u:25_3: ato yāvad bodhisattvo bodhisattvasaṃvarasthitaḥ puṇyarāśiyukto bhavati tāvad aśraddhayā sa tenaiva apuṇyarāśinā ca yukto bhavati /
SA11bsa040_u:25_4: yato bodhisattvaḥ sattvān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parirakṣati anyāṃśca pāpebhyo nivārayati /
SA11bsa040_u:26_0: atha śikṣāpadapārājikasthānabhūtān saṃvaranāśahetūn darśayitvā duṣkṛtān kliṣṭākliṣṭān api darśayet /
SA11bsa040_u:26_1: kalyāṇamitraḥ samāsato 'bodhisattvasaṃvaraviṃśakam' tathā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ śīlaparivarttañca bhāṣeta /
SA11bsa040_u:28_0: tenaiva bhāratīyopādhyāyena mahāsaṃśodhakalokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-kuśalamatinā (dge vai blo gros) cānūditaḥ /
SA11bsa040_u:29_0: punastenaiva paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-jayaśīlena (chul khrims rgyal va) ca saṃśodhya nirṇītaḥ /
